title: The Bachelorette's Warwick walks out during a group photo shoot
text:
The Bachelorette's Warwick Adams has walked out and quit the show following an altercation during a group photoshoot on Thursday night.

After being invited on a group date, the chosen contestants were each given animal costumes to wear for a farmyard-themed scene.

But Warwick, who wore the chicken costume, flew into a rage when his rivals poked fun of his attire, claiming they had 'gone too far' and he was 'f***ing over it'.

What a chicken! The Bachelorette's Warwick Adams (pictured) has quit the show after storming off a photo shoot dressed as a farmyard animal

'Yeah it doesn't look that good bro, I'm sorry,' Jess informed Warwick shortly after he completed the look.

Timm added: 'That's not the first time you've had nuts on your chin, eh, Wazza?'

Warwick immediately started pulling off the costume and told the men that he'd had enough.

Not funny? Warwick, who dressed up as a chicken for a farm themed shoot, wasn't impressed when the other suitor's joked about his costume

Warwick raged while storming off: 'You know what well f**k off mate. I'm f***ing over it'

'You know what well f**k off mate. I'm f***ing over it,' he said. 'I've just f**king pulled the pin.'

'But that's... this is too far,' he added, as he asked for the crew to take off his microphone while removing his yellow face paint.

Warwick stormed off and left the group date, with Angie Kent soon questioning his absence at the farmyard photo shoot.

'I'm not gonna continue on': After returning to the mansion, Warwick informed the contestants that he was 'done' and would be leaving the show

After returning to the mansion, then suited contestants started to prepare themselves for the show's second rose ceremony.

But then Warwick emerged in a hooded jumper and chinos and informed the men he would be immediately leaving the mansion.

'As soon as I got handed the chicken, I just feel like it's not the way that I'm gonna meet the person that I will fall in love with in my life,' he announced.

'I'm not gonna continue on,' he explained, before leaving the mansion.
description: The Bachelorette's Warwick Adams has walked out and quit the show following an altercation during a group photoshoot on Thursday night.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
